Developer Terms of Use
des:
To use Vimar’s VIEW skill, you will need: 
1) to install the Vimar connected home automation system, such as By-me Plus, and all other systems/products from Vimar’s VIEW platform which are compatible with the skill.
2) to have a professional installer configure the systems/products with the related APPs (such as VIEW Pro) or configuration software (e.g. By-alarm Manager). 
3) perform account linking between your Amazon account and your Vimar account (created in the MyVIMAR section of the Vimar website).

Controls linked to the products/systems:
 - Connected lights
 "Alexa, turn on the light"
 " Alexa, set the light in the bathroom to 50%"
 " Alexa, dim the light by 50%"
 " Alexa, set the bedroom light to red"
 ....
- Connected thermostats
 "Alexa, increase the basement temperature"
 "Alexa, set the temperature to 22 degrees"
....
- Connected roller shutters
 "Alexa, raise up the roller shutter in the living room"
 "Alexa, set the roller shutter to 30%"
....
- Scenarios
 "Alexa, activate relax"
 ....
